1.title: Hulk vs the Avengers
1.plot: The Hulk has escaped from a secret S.H.I.E.L.D. facility and is on his usual rampage. With the bulk of the Avengers on assignment, it's up to Captain America and Iron Man to stop the Hulk. In need of aid, they recruit Spider-man and Wolverine to join the maelstrom of events that is "Hulk vs The Avengers."

2.title: The Phantom Signal
2.plot: Go behind the scenes with S.H.I.E.L.D. Sharon Carter returns to S.H.I.E.L.D. after being told by Captain America to be a stay-at-home girlfriend. She returns without his knowledge and begins training. Little does she know, that the events surrounding RANDOM MARVEL are about to begin. Join Nick Fury, Maria Hill, Wasp, Dum Dum Dugan and Sharon Carter as they try to solve the mystery of the phantom signal that has released the Hulk and threatens to cause even more chaos down the road.

3.title: Fantastic Foursome
3.plot: With Doctor Doom's hacking program proven successful by releasing the Hulk from a S.H.I.E.L.D. base, he turns his sights and those of the Pentagram Syndicate to his favorite nemesis. He hires Wolverine's greatest enemies to assassinate the Fantastic Four. In return he will use the Syndicates resources to capture Wolverine for them. The sequel to the smash hit, "Hulk vs. the Avengers," is here, and Coulter Rail's series "Random Marvel" takes flight.

4.title: Take A.I.M.
4.plot: S.H.I.E.L.D. strikes back in all directions in an attempt to locate the origin of the phantom hacking signal. Nick Fury sets his sights on A.I.M. as Dugan heads to the X-Mansion to dig deeper into the shady events currently throwing the Marvel Universe of its axis. Don't miss the next installment in Coulter Rail's epic series that parallels RANDOM MARVEL.

5.title: Wolverine Buster
5.plot: As visions of a dire future plague Professor X, Wolverine, in his usual fury, roars off in the usual direction: the traumatic and familiar Canadian tundra of his youth. Only this time, he is pursued with utmost propriety and deadly efficiency by the hijacked JARVIS, who, at the behest of Doctor Doom, has taken command of Iron Man's fleet of suits. Back at Doom's castle, the disgruntled mercenary squad of Deadpool, Lady Deathstrike, Omega Red, and Pyro brief the good doctor on their successful mission at the Baxter Building as their new captive, Invisible Woman, whines...

imdb.plot outline: Follow Doctor Doom and four mysterious villains as they use a hacking program to destroy the Marvel world. Follow Nick Fury in a parallel storyline as he and S.H.I.E.L.D. attempt to prevent Doom's dastardly scheme in this hilarious stop motion adventure.
imdb.title: Random Marvel
plot: Follow Doctor Doom and four mysterious villains as they use a hacking program to destroy the Marvel world. Follow Nick Fury in a parallel storyline as he and S.H.I.E.L.D. attempt to prevent Doom's dastardly scheme in this hilarious stop motion adventure.
